string.name: card_browser
string.comment: The usage of card browser inside the app (note the casing)

resources.string: Incumintza a annànghere cartas\n impreende s\'icona +.

string.name: undo
string.comment: When tapping on this text, the last action is undone.

string.name: undo_action_whiteboard_last_stroke
string.comment: One of the display patterns of \'Undo\' item on the action menu in Reviewer. It is shown as the title of the item when the whiteboard (handwriting) feature is enabled and visible and has any strokes (handwritten lines)

resources.string: Move totu a intro de su matzu

string.name: menu_add
string.comment: A generic add button. Please inform us if you need more specific strings

string.name: menu_my_account
string.comment: Label of the window in which the user should enter their account. This text can\'t be found in AnkiDroid directly.

resources.string: Càmbia su nùmene a sas banderas
Marca sa carta cun una bandera
Boles a beru iscantzellare custa nota e totu sas cartas suas?\n %s
Boga sa marcadura a sa nota
Sa cartella de AnkiDroid no est atzessìbile
Dae a AnkiDroid su permissu de Archiviatzione pro sighire
Torrende a fraigare su matzu filtradu…
In antis càmbia su nùmene a su matzu de istùdiu personalizadu chi esistit

string.name: search_for_download_deck
string.comment: Deck search value for downloading deck

resources.string: Nùmene de su matzu non vàlidu
Bene meda! Pro como as agabbadu.

string.name: studyoptions_congrats_next_due_in
string.comment: The param will be replaced with \'The next card will be ready in X time\'

resources.string: Sa memòria de su dispositivu no est montada
Annullende…\n Bi diat pòdere chèrrere unu pagu de tempus.
Mollu de sa parte de segus
Aparèntzia de su navigadore de cartas
B\'at bisòngiu de a su nessi una casta de cartas

plurals.name: card_template_editor_confirm_add
plurals.item: Custu at a creare %1$d carta. Cheres sighire?
Custu at a creare %1$d cartas. Cheres sighire?

plurals.name: card_template_editor_confirm_delete
plurals.item: Cheres iscantzellare sa casta de cartas “%2$s” e sa carta chi cuntenet?
Cheres iscantzellare sa casta de cartas “%2$s” e sas %1$d cartas suas?

resources.string: Impossìbile sarvare sas modìficas a su mollu de carta: %s
Sa casta de carta pro sa carta atuale est istada iscantzellada.
Leghe e iscrie in sa base de datos de AnkiDroid
atzede a sas notas, a sas cartas, a sas castas de notas e a sos matzos chi esistint giai, e crea·nde de noos

string.name: card_browser_context_menu
string.comment: The value which appears in the system context menu. Note the casing difference

resources.string: Sas colletziones non si podent cumbinare.\n Cale colletzione cheres mantènnere·?

string.name: sync_conflict_keep_local_new
string.comment: Select AnkiDroid files to keep while syncing

string.name: sync_conflict_keep_remote_new
string.comment: Select AnkiWeb files to keep while syncing

resources.string: Cheres remplasare sa colletzione tua in AnkiDroid cun sa colletzione tua dae AnkiWeb?
Cheres remplasare sa colletzione tua in AnkiWeb cun sa colletzione tua dae AnkiDroid?
Non faghet a iscrìere o creare su documentu %s

string.name: directory_inaccessible_after_uninstall
string.comment: Dialog title if AnkiDroid can\'t access the collection once the app is installed

resources.string: Non faghet a atzèdere a sa colletzione

string.name: directory_inaccessible_after_uninstall_summary
string.comment: the parameter is the path to the AnkiDroid folder. Typically /storage/emulated/0/AnkiDroid

resources.string:
Non semus in gradu de atzèdere a sa colletzione tua a pustis de sa disinstallatzione de AnkiDroid pro neghe de una modìfica in sa polìtica de su Play Store

Sos datos tuos sunt seguros e si podent ripristinare. Sunt postos in
%s

Seletziona un'optzione in suta pro ripristinare:

string.name: directory_revoked_after_inactivity
string.comment: the first parameter is WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE the second parameter is the path to the AnkiDroid folder. Typically /storage/emulated/0/AnkiDroid

resources.string:
Android at pogadu su permissu de %1$s de AnkiDroid pro more de s'inatividade de s'aplicatzione.

Sos datos tuos sunt sarvos e si podent ripristinare. Sunt sarvados in
%2$s

Seletziona un'optzione inoghe in suta pro los ripristinare:
Riprìstina dae una còpia de seguresa .colpkg (avantzadu)
Sa colletzione noa s\'at a iscantzellare dae su telèfonu tuo si as a disinstallare AnkiDroid
AnkiDroid tenet bisòngiu de unos cantos permissos pro funtzionare
Sarvat sa colletzione tua in unu logu seguru chi non s\'at a iscantzellare si as a disinstallare s\'aplicatzione

string.name: all_files_access_title
string.comment: Name of the “All files access” permission from Android 10 and after

string.name: remove_account
string.comment: open a website to start the deletion of an AnkiWeb account

string.name: instant_card
string.comment: This does not need to be translated literally, translate the concept of quickly adding a Cloze note with a popup. Used in the Android system context menu/share dialog.
